briefTitle: LCCC1931:Post-treatment Intervention in Women With Breast Cancer (70y/o+)
officialTitle: LCCC1931: Interventions to Address Symptoms and Deficits in Women Age 70 Plus During the First Year Post Primary Treatment for Early Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of Participants who agree to referral
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women aged 70 or older
* within 6 months of complete primary treatment (surgery, chemotherapy, targeted therapy, or radiation) for reach breast cancer (Stage I-III)
* Able to read English
* Willing and capable of providing informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

-Has dementia, altered mental status, or any psychiatric or co-morbid condition prohibiting the understanding or rendering of informed consent.
